summary: Provides utilities to serialize data to JSON, optionally compress it, encode it in a URL‑safe base64 format, and attach an HMAC‑based signature (with optional timestamp) for integrity and authenticity checks. Includes helpers for encoding/decoding, signature generation, verification, and related exception handling.
business_intent: Enable Django applications to create tamper‑proof, optionally time‑limited tokens such as signed cookies, URLs, or other data payloads, ensuring that the data has not been altered and, when needed, that it is still within a valid time window.
